entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Okotoks
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:30 AM MST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 11 March 2023
